scripts.clean:all: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.ats:build:all: npm run ats:build:contracts && npm run ats:build:sdk && npm run ats:build:web
scripts.ats:test:all: npm run ats:test:contracts && npm run ats:test:sdk && npm run ats:test:web
scripts.mass-payout:build:all: npm run build --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run build --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.mass-payout:test:all: npm run test --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run test --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.ats:start: npm run ats:build:contracts && npm run ats:build:sdk && npm run ats:dev
scripts.mass-payout:start: npm run mass-payout:build:all && npm run mass-payout:dev
